author: wsmoak
msg: Marked the JUnit dependency as optional.  JUnit would normally be in test scope, but it is required to compile oas.mock.TestMockBase.

author: cschoett
msg: Partial fix for BEEHIVE-1028, this fix addresses the ControlFilter only NOT pageflows.  The fix consists of removing the 'useSession' flag from the ControlFilter and creating a new control bean context for each request.
